import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable, of } from 'rxjs'; import { UnsplashService } from '../unsplash.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-unsplash', // template: //`
`, templateUrl: './unsplash.component.html', styleUrls: ['./unsplash.component.scss'], styles:[] }) export class UnsplashComponent implements OnInit { photos: any; constructor(private unsplashService: UnsplashService) {} ngOnInit(){ this.unsplashService.getPhotos().subscribe(photos => { this.photos = photos; }); } }
